snippet: Bahrain also recalled its own ambassador over allegations that Iran sponsored “subversion” and funneled arms to militants in the country.
abstract: Bahrain expels Iranian official and recalls its won ambassador, over allegations Iran had funneled arms to militants in Bahrain; country's Sunni rulers have faced Shiite unrest in recent years.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Bahrain also recalled its own ambassador over allegations that Iran sponsored “subversion” and funneled arms to militants in the country.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Bahrain: Iranian Diplomat Is Expelled
